original_text:
May you blow them away like smoke—
    as wax melts before the fire,
    may the wicked perish before God.
korean_text: 연기가 불려 가듯이 그들을 몰아내소서 불 앞에서 밀이 녹음 같이 악인이 하나님 앞에서 망하게 하소서

sentences.original_text: May you blow them away like smoke
as wax melts before the fire
may the wicked perish before God
